CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("/lightning/r/" & Id & "/view", IF( ISBLANK( Contact__r.PreferredName__pc ), TRIM( Contact__r.FirstName + " " + Contact__r.MiddleName + " " + Contact__r.LastName ), TRIM( Contact__r.PreferredName__pc + " " + Contact__r.LastName ) ), "_self")
CustomField.label: Request Name
